amendment.description: Amendment clarifies the definition of "rural" in the bill to make it consistent with the same definition in the Housing Act of 1949 with the inclusion of language concerning micropolitan areas and tribal trust lands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-254 to clarify the definition of `rural' to make it consistent with the same definition in the Housing Act of 1949; and to retain `micro-politan area' and `tribal trust lands' as part of the definition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (AL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
